title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Attained a track record of consistently achieving perfect story points in every sprint week while serving as a Software Engineer Intern Frontend Web Developer. Demonstrated a keen understanding of agile methodologies to enhance project efficiency and delivery of building AquaHero Dashboard

title: Mobile Developer
description: With a strong sense of responsibility, I spearheaded the development of the iOS version of the MyEco application using Flutter and Firebase. I contributed over 10,000 lines of code and successfully delivered the project within a demanding three-month deadline.
